channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: After staying up all night to prep, Finn makes a major misstep and Emily is left scrambling to fix it. A-Troupe lets off some steam the night before their performance, but their fun is cut short when they discover their former teammate at their door. Discouraged about Summer?s decision, Cleo abandons her plans and it?s up to Jude to remind her what made them special in the first place.
